body: r_c watches the vigil being held for m_c from the sidelines, not at all sure how {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/feel/feels} about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} death.

r_c resented m_c for what {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} couldn't have, but seeing m_c's body lying in the clearing as the Clan hold vigil for {PRONOUN/m_c/object} makes {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} jealousy feel petty and stupid.
r_c has always felt jealous of m_c, but could never want to take {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} place now, watching the Clan holding vigil for {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

r_c listens to the stories being passed around as the vigil for m_c continues, and stalks off to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nest. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} can't stand hearing everyone praise such a useless cat.
m_c really wasn't that great, but it's amazing how many cats want to ignore that now that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} dead, and r_c isn't interested in hearing it.
